summary:
**Grey's Anatomy** is an American TV show about doctors at a fake hospital in Seattle. It started in 2005 and is still on TV, making it ABC's longest-running scripted show.

The show follows Dr. Meredith Grey as she becomes a top surgeon. Many actors from the original cast left, but the show remains popular. It has won many awards and made its stars famous.  It has also inspired two spin-off shows.
title: Grey's Anatomy
